# College Library Management System Instructions

## Project Overview

This is a Tamil Nadu college library management system built with React.js frontend and Node.js backend.

## Development Guidelines

- Build Phase 1 first (no authentication)
- Use Light Neon Green theme (#22c55e)
- Focus on clean, minimalistic UI
- Follow Tamil Nadu college library rules
- Register Number as primary student identifier

## Tech Stack

- Frontend: React.js + Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js + Express.js
- Database: MySQL
- Authentication: JWT (Phase 2)
